alert.note: Alert for Early; Miller (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 2:10PM EDT until May 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 209 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Blakely, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Blakely, Columbia, Centerville, Cuba, Hentown, Rock Hill, Hilton, Sawhatchee and Cedar Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
